name: Allergies from Mutagen / Revelation

patterns.pattern: ^Skin flushing a deep red, (\w+) looks upon .+ in disbelief.$
^(\w+) cringes as a dark red rash spreads painfully across .+ skin.$
^(\w+) wheezes loudly as .+ body weakens under the stress, most of .+ skin now dark red.$
^Skin flushing a deep red, (\w+) issues a mournful wail.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
 snd.target_got("allergies")
end

name: Addiction from Mutagen / Revelation

patterns.pattern: ^Growing unfocused, a perverse addiction settles over (\w+).$
^(\w+)'s hands begin to shake as .+ turns restless.$
^(\w+) casts \w+ gaze to and fro in search of addictive sedatives and curatives.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
 snd.target_got("addiction")
end

name: Lethargy from Mutagen / Revelation

patterns.pattern: ^(\w+) slows, energy draining from \w+ as \w+ struggles to move.$
^(\w+) slows to a halt as hopeless lethargy grips \w+ limbs.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
 snd.target_got("lethargy")
end

name: Blisters from Mutagen / Revelation

patterns.pattern: ^(\w+)'s skin blisters virulently, sacs of pus and blood bulging from \w+ frame.$
^(\w+)'s flesh flakes and chips as horrific blisters arise upon \w+ flesh.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
 snd.target_got("blisters")
end

name: Weariness from Mutagen / Revelation

patterns.pattern: ^Stumbling, (\w+)'s musculature withers and frays where \w+ stands.$
^Stumbling, (\w+) looks down to see \w+ musculature withering before \w+ very eyes.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
	snd.target_got("weariness")
end

name: Impairment from Mutagen / Revelation

patterns.pattern: ^(\w+)'s body contorts, warping into a subtle yet unrecognizable configuration.$
^Existential horror contorts (\w+)'s visage, its chill twisting at \w+ physique.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
	snd.target_got("impairment")
end

name: Mutagen / Revelation Cured

patterns.pattern: ^The mutagen placed upon (\w+) has expired, its lifespan complete.$
^The mutagen placed upon (\w+) has expired, too far from you.$
^The maddening revelations placed within (\w+)'s mind expire, too far away from your psychic influence.$
^The maddening revelations within (\w+)'s mind reach their end, their lifespan complete.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
 	snd.target_cured("mutagen")
	snd.my_mutagen = false
	snd.their_mutagen = false
end

name: Nexus / Kismet Proc

patterns.pattern: ^Your mutagen leaps from you to (\w+), crackling through the air.$
^Mass hysteria pours forth from you alike to a river, sowing eldritch truth within (\w+)'s mind.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
	if snd.class == "Archivist" then
    snd.send("qeb bio advance")
  elseif snd.class == "Voidseer" then
    snd.send("qeb void advance")
  end
end

name: Sadness from Mutagen / Revelation

patterns.pattern: ^Melancholy settles upon (\w+)\.$
^(\w+) cries out and sways on \w+ feet as visions assail \w+ mind.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
	snd.target_got("sadness")
end

name: Masochism from Mutagen / Revelation

patterns.pattern: ^(\w+) gives a laugh, a strange glint rising into \w+ eyes.$
^(\w+) barks out a harsh laugh, mad glee reflected within \w+ eyes.$

script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
	snd.target_got("masochism")
end
